description: User-facing progress state label for a work request, shown in the work-in-progress view to indicate the current stage.
Free-text explanation describing the meaning or use of this progress state; used for user guidance.
Identifier for the master code or category this status belongs to; likely a foreign key to a code table; confirm with SME.
Identifier for the specific status within the master code/status table; used to link to standardized definitions; confirm with SME.
Login or process that created the status record.
Date and time the status record was created.
Login or process that last modified the status record.
Date and time the status record was last modified.
UI color assigned to this status for visual cues (e.g., HEX/RGB); confirm format with SME.
Indicator showing whether this status is applied by default when creating a new work request in this context (Y/N).
System-normalized status value mapped to the progress state, used for workflow rules and integrations.
Numeric order controlling how statuses appear or progress within lists and workflows.
